mapper.select: Select * From (Select Row_number() over(order by C.월,C.품목코드) rn, C.기준월 stdate, C.월 month, C.품목계정 itemkind, C.품목코드 itemcd, C.품목명 itemnm, C.규격 size, C.입고수량 inqty, C.출고계 sumout, C.출고 outqty, C.재고 jqty, C.품목수 coitemcd, C.품목순번 seqitemcd, C.단가 price, C.금액 amt, C.비고 remark, C.비고상세 dremark, convert(varchar(200),C.일수)+'일' overdate From (Select 기준월,월,품목계정,품목코드,품목명,규격,입고수량,출고계,출고,재고,품목수,품목순번,단가,금액,비고,Case when 일수>=365 Then convert(varchar(100),일수/365)+convert(varchar(100),'년 초과') Else convert(varchar(200),비고) End 비고상세,일수 From (Select 기준월,월,품목계정,품목코드,품목명,규격,입고수량,출고계,출고,재고,품목수,품목순번,단가,금액,비고,Datediff(dd,a.비교월,a.비교기준월) 일수 From (select convert(date,standard_date+'01') 비교기준월,convert(date,dates+'01') 비교월,standard_date 기준월,dates 월,codenm 품목계정,itemcd 품목코드,itemnm 품목명,size 규격,toqty 입고수량,toqty2 출고계,toqty3 출고,stock 재고,itemcdcount 품목수,seq 품목순번,unitprice 단가,amt 금액,remark 비고 from Last_TemporaryData where stock not like '0%' and standard_date like #{keyword}) A ) B ) C ) D where rn>=#{page_start} and rn<=#{page_end}

Select Count(*) From Last_TemporaryData where standard_date like #{keyword}
Select standard_date stdate,codenm itemkind,sum(stock) jqty,sum(amt) amt From Last_TemporaryData where standard_date Like #{keyword} group by standard_date,codenm Order by amt desc
